keyPolicies.policyDescription: Thurrock Council figures show I have put in more casework and helped more people in Thurrock than both Tory MPs combined.
Fighting new Thames Crossing: No more Crossings in Thurrock. Thurrock has had enough. It will bring more traffic and more pollution.
Tackle the housing crisis: Thurrock residents should be put first in the housing queue. We need to reduce migration to ease pressure on the housing stock.
On 5th April, only UKIP MEPs voted to stop unlimited migration after Brexit. The Tories and Labour want to continue free movement.
72% of people in Thurrock voted to leave the EU. The Tory MP voted to Remain in the EU. Please support our fight for a Brexit MP.
I will fight the Tory cuts to our NHS including the proposed ending of services at Orsett Hospital. Thurrock needs a new hospital.

images.caption: Tim Aker and UKIP Winning Here
